title: nI pada bhayamu
sahitya:
nI pada bhayamu niratamuga bhAgyam nishcayambosagu nE satya svarUpamaina


anupallavi

  lOpa mudrArcita pancadashAkshari lAvaNya shrI lalitE tripurasundari


caraNam    kAmAri kAmini bhAma shikhAmaNi shyAma suhAsini shrtajana pAlini
sOma divAkara anala kalAdhari nAma priyakari naTarAja pUjita
